description: This Kotlin source file defines the SettingsActivity class, which is an Android activity responsible for displaying a minimalist settings screen in the app. It sets up the theme, layout, toolbar, and navigation behavior.

classes.name: SettingsActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that displays a minimalistic settings screen with a toolbar and a back button.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the theme, layout, toolbar, and title.

methods.name: onSupportNavigateUp
methods.description: Handles the navigation when the up button is pressed, finishing the activity.
